properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c1 c2 v2 c1 c2 v3 c1 c2 v4 c1 c2

authors.author: St. Paul Students' Choir (University of Nairobi)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Acheni mimi - Nimuimbie
Muumba wangu,
Aliyeniumba - Mimi kiumbe
mwenye akili ). x2
Aliyenipa uwezo wa
kusimama hapa.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Tangu tumboni mwa
mama amenipa uhai
Juzi jana leo nimeamka
kesho ajua yeye
Maisha yangu ayapa maziwa
ni kama mtoto
(Acheni mimi - nizitamke
sifa za Mungu wangu
Na sitachoka, kumuimbia
mimi ningali hai). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nalala jioni na kuamka
pia nazo nguvu,
Ninafanya kazi na
kujipatia riziki zangu.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Amenipatia akili yangu
na wangu ubunifu,
Shuleni kazini ninayoyafanya
hayana pungufu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mara nyingi sana
ninajiuliza nitampa nini
Kwani Bwana amenitendea
mengi bila ya kwa nini.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ninapokuwa nazo shida
nyingi hunipa tulizo,
Kwake kila mara watu
wote hupata burudiko.
